title: SAM.gov Scraper Input
description: Configure your SAM.gov federal contract scraper - NO API KEY REQUIRED

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Search keywords to filter opportunities (e.g., 'software development', 'IT services')

naicsCodes.title: NAICS Codes
naicsCodes.description: Filter by NAICS codes (e.g., 541511 for Custom Computer Programming)

postedWithinDays.title: Posted Within Days
postedWithinDays.description: Only fetch opportunities posted within this many days

setAsideTypes.title: Set-Aside Types
setAsideTypes.description: Filter by set-aside type codes (SBA, 8A, HUBZone, SDVOSBC, WOSB, etc.)

states.title: States
states.description: Filter by state codes (e.g., CA, TX, VA)

opportunityTypes.title: Opportunity Types
opportunityTypes.description: Filter by opportunity type codes: o=Solicitation, k=Combined Synopsis/Solicitation, p=Presolicitation, r=Sources Sought, s=Special Notice, g=Sale of Surplus

downloadAttachments.title: Download Attachments
downloadAttachments.description: Download RFPs, SOWs, and other documents attached to opportunities

extractText.title: Extract PDF Text
extractText.description: Extract text content from PDF attachments for searching/analysis

maxOpportunities.title: Maximum Opportunities
maxOpportunities.description: Maximum number of opportunities to scrape
